content: If you're buying something, we can just switch our roles.

Whether you buy or not, I'm fine with either.
But if you can give me something worth over 100 Dough,
I'll show you a magic trick, how about that?

I can tell you know your way around making money!
If you can find me some more trash,
worth over 100 Dough total, I'll show you a magic trick.

I like how generous you are with your spending!
If you can bring me items worth over 100 Dough in total,
I'll show you a magic trick - how does that sound?

When I'm buying back stuff, which means when you're selling things.
Our roles are reversed then.
Your backpack is full. Come back after you've tidied it up!
I'm more curious about how you recycled it.
Would you like to hear about our sales service or recycling service first?

Oh, shopping is simple - you just pick what you want,
I'll tell you the price,
and then we do the good old "money in one hand, goods in the other!"

You show me what you've got, I'll give you a price.
If you want to sell,
We'll do a simple cash-and-carry deal.

Let me explain everything at once.
You pick what you want to buy,
I'll give you the price, and then we'll do a simple cash-for-goods exchange.
Pick whichever one you want to introduce.

So you're the trash collection heir my dear sister has her eye on!
Well then, I better give you a proper introduction to my services.

I've put all my goods in the bag up front.
Would you like to establish a partnership with me?
It's simple - we just need to swap roles when selling stuff.
